char_info.char_desc: The Plant Whose Hair Never Stops Growing

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There you go. I ruined your hair. How do you like it?

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I might have a pixie cut, but...

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My hair is back. I'll have to redo my hair though.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm out of here. I heard this may have started in the Palace of Eternity...
